statements: SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram;
SELECT customer_name, points_accumulated FROM LoyaltyProgram ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_total FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE points_accumulated > 100;
SELECT customer_id, points_accumulated FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE purchase_total BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram ORDER BY purchase_total DESC, points_accumulated ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, points_accumulated FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE purchase_total > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_total FROM LoyaltyProgram ORDER BY purchase_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE points_accumulated BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_total, points_accumulated FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE purchase_total < 500;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Customer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, purchase_date FROM Purchase ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, phone FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT name, email, phone FROM Customer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, amount, purchase_date FROM Purchase WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, amount FROM Customer INNER JOIN Purchase ON Customer.id = Purchase.customer_id;
SELECT name, phone, purchase_date FROM Customer JOIN Purchase ON Customer.id = Purchase.customer_id ORDER BY customer_id, purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, remaining_points FROM customers LEFT JOIN loyalty_points ON customers.customer_id = loyalty_points.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE registration_date <= NOW();
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_points - redeemed_points AS available_points FROM customers JOIN loyalty_points ON customers.customer_id = loyalty_points.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM rewards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM customers INNER JOIN points ON customers.customer_id = points.customer_id WHERE points_redeemed < points_earned;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM customers c JOIN points pts ON c.customer_id = pts.customer_id WHERE points_earned > points_redeemed ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, required_points FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.required_points < 500 ORDER BY required_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM Purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, reward_name, point_cost FROM Rewards WHERE point_cost < 50;
SELECT customer_id, points, timestamp FROM Points ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM Rewards ORDER BY point_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE type = 'payment' LIMIT 5;
